word_mean: 一种旋转开关的部件。它由固定的圆片(定片)组成，能按预定的组合互连线端，在单根轴上可安装若干个触片并同时动作。

sentence.Network_en: Cut the fennel into wafer-thin slices.
sentence.Network_cn: 把茴香切成薄薄的小片。

sentence.Network_en: She opened her mouth to receive the papery - thin wafer.
sentence.Network_cn: 她张开嘴领受薄薄的圣饼.

sentence.Network_en: Single - wafer processes use higher pressures than the batch processes.
sentence.Network_cn: 单片工艺比多片工艺要用较高的压力.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 晶圆（WAFER）：多指单晶硅圆片，由普通硅沙拉制提炼而成，是最常用的半导体材料。按其直径分为4英寸、5英寸、6英寸、8英寸 …
因此晶片(Wafer)的厚度也由650微米(Micron)一路减薄至120微米、 100 微米、75 微米、50 微米、25 微米。当厚度降到100um 以下…
当圆片(wafer)上电路制作完毕后，封装是器件性能是否可以实现或发挥的关键。- 互连是从芯片到器件，从器件到组件和系统的桥梁。
硅片（Wafer）清洗：RCA清洗、SPM清洗、SC清洗、金属离子及杂物去除清洗等　　硅片（Wafer）蚀刻：DHF蚀刻、BHF蚀刻、BO…

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from an Anglo-Norman French variant of Old French gaufre (see goffer), from Middle Low German wāfel 'waffle'; compare with waffle

entry.tran: 威化饼，薄脆饼(常与冰激凌同吃)
entry.def: A wafer is a thin crisp biscuit which is usually eaten with ice cream.

entry.tran: (基督教圣餐仪式上牧师发放的)圣饼
entry.def: A wafer is a circular, thin piece of special bread which the priest gives people to eat in the Christian service of Holy Communion.

means.word_mean: 1. a small adhesive disk of paste; used to seal letters
2. a small thin crisp cake or cookie
3. thin disk of unleavened bread used in a religious service (especially in the celebration of the Eucharist)
